column1: #Text=Bolin says : " Kale , kale , kale ... Opal ... " Bolin says : " What ?
#Text=Okay , we are seriously going to have to have a talk - What the heck ?!
#Text=" Ming - Hua says : " So much for the element of surprise .
#Text=" Mako says : " We ca n't let them take her .
#Text=" Asami says : " I do n't think they 're going to get far .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " We have you surrounded .
#Text=That 's awesome ... ly not good for us .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " I 'm going to create some cover .
#Text=We 've got to get out of here !
#Text=" Lin says : " How did they get in here ?
#Text=" Suyin says : " I do n't know , but we 're not letting them escape !
#Text=" Asami says : " There 's no way to cross that moat .
#Text=" Suyin says : " We do n't need to cross it .
#Text=Lin and I can drop in from the dome on cables .
#Text=" Lin says : " That 's a great idea .
#Text=Except we 'll get blown up the second that third - eyed freak sees us .
#Text=If one of you can stun her , her powers will be knocked out temporarily .
#Text=" Mako says : " Bolin can land a shot .
#Text=" Suyin says : " You have to take her out right before we drop down .
